formattedAddress: 11 E 13th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Not sure why this is getting such negative review. The bar was beautiful and the service was great. It is a great addition to the city. The place just opened so you can expect some adjustments on service quality. Great place for drinks and dates. Will definitely go back.

text.text: Not sure why this is getting such negative review. The bar was beautiful and the service was great. It is a great addition to the city. The place just opened so you can expect some adjustments on service quality. Great place for drinks and dates. Will definitely go back.

originalText.text: Had a wonderful time at this new speakeasy. The vibe is so lush and sultry - definitely try to reserve a booth if you can! They're semi-private and have their own personal disco ball hanging from the top. I didn't get to try much food, just the oysters but they have a great menu. Also, the drinks were phenomenal - one of the best espresso martinis I've had in the city!

text.text: Had a wonderful time at this new speakeasy. The vibe is so lush and sultry - definitely try to reserve a booth if you can! They're semi-private and have their own personal disco ball hanging from the top. I didn't get to try much food, just the oysters but they have a great menu. Also, the drinks were phenomenal - one of the best espresso martinis I've had in the city!

originalText.text: If the goal of this place was to look like Versailles and if the goal of the staff was to treat you like royalty, both were certainly accomplished here! The staff is not only friendly and attentive but they have excellent recommendations and they certainly know how to spoil you. The bartenders mix together amazing drinks not only in presentation but also in taste and they are very generous.  The space itself has you feeling like you're in the lap of luxury and extravagance.  Everything here was so picture worthy, from the well plates bites to the showstopping cocktails to the arrestingly attractive decor of plush velvet seats and drapes all under mood lighting.  And I loved the infinite mirror effect they had set up on the way to the restrooms.  I have been here twice in the span of 21 days and I will keep coming back because there is so much to love about this place!

originalText.text: Such a great atmosphere and vibe, went with a group a friends and loved the drinks and appetizers. Not sure why there's negative reviews about service, we loved our server and all the staff were very nice.

text.text: Such a great atmosphere and vibe, went with a group a friends and loved the drinks and appetizers. Not sure why there's negative reviews about service, we loved our server and all the staff were very nice.

originalText.text: We had such an incredible time at Le Louis last night! The drinks were amazing, the service was incredible and the decor was so fun! Will definitely be back soon!
